body_text:
The changeset is large, but the vast majority of it is test fixes. Things to note:

I'm tempted to rename Action to Implementation in the future given what the API looks like now, or to change that key in the API to action instead. Feedback on this point is welcome.
The changes to the order of fields in the admin were made from feedback that @gregglind gave to me in person.
Turns out the adminsortable library was what added FontAwesome to the Django admin automatically. Without it, we need to include FontAwesome manually. Laaaaaaaame.

title: Fix bug 1257263: Only one action per recipe.
body:
The changeset is large, but the vast majority of it is test fixes. Things to note:
- I'm tempted to rename `Action` to `Implementation` in the future given what the API looks like now, or to change that key in the API to `action` instead. Feedback on this point is welcome.
- The changes to the order of fields in the admin were made from feedback that @gregglind gave to me in person.
- Turns out the adminsortable library was what added FontAwesome to the Django admin automatically. Without it, we need to include FontAwesome manually. Laaaaaaaame.
